article_node.title: CCTV+: China Up Close: Zhejiang Tour Explores Deqing
article_node.summary: From August 8 to 10, 2025, the "China Up Close Series: Zhejiang Tour" hosted nearly 70 journalists and editors from various countries, including South Korea, Spain, Bulgaria, and Iceland, in Deqing, Zhejiang province. The event, organized in collaboration with CGTN, aimed to showcase the region's landscapes, history, and culture to international audiences.
